import React, {useState} from 'react' import PageHeader from '../../components/PageHeader' import Input from '../../components/Input' import Textarea from '../../components/Textarea'; import Select from '../../components/Select'; import warningIcon from '../../assets/images/icons/warning.svg'; import './styles.css' function TeacherForm(){ const [scheduleItems, setScheduleItems] = useState([ { week_day: 0, from: '', to: ''} ]) function addNewScheludeItem(){ setScheduleItems([ ...scheduleItems, { week_day: 0, from: '', to: ''} ]) } return(
